name: micro-frontend-golden-sample
description: Golden sample project demonstrating micro-frontend architecture using React + Webpack Module Federation + Material-UI

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "CONTAINER,USER-MGMT,DATA-GRID,ANALYTICS,SETTINGS" --prefix-colors "blue,green,red,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:container" "npm run dev:user-management" "npm run dev:data-grid" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:settings"
scripts.dev:minimal: concurrently --names "BACKEND,CONTAINER,USER-MGMT,DATA-GRID,ANALYTICS,SETTINGS" --prefix-colors "cyan,blue,green,red,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:container-minimal" "npm run dev:user-management-minimal" "npm run dev:data-grid-minimal" "npm run dev:analytics-minimal" "npm run dev:settings-minimal"
scripts.dev:container-minimal: cd frontend/container && npx webpack serve --config webpack.minimal.js --port 3000
scripts.dev:user-management-minimal: cd frontend/user-management-app && npx webpack serve --config webpack.minimal.js --port 3001
scripts.dev:data-grid-minimal: cd frontend/data-grid-app && npx webpack serve --config webpack.minimal.js --port 3002
scripts.dev:analytics-minimal: cd frontend/analytics-app && npx webpack serve --config webpack.minimal.js --port 3003
scripts.dev:settings-minimal: cd frontend/settings-app && npx webpack serve --config webpack.minimal.js --port 3004
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend/shared-ui-lib && npm install && cd ../container && npm install && cd ../user-management-app && npm install && cd ../data-grid-app && npm install && cd ../analytics-app && npm install && cd ../settings-app && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend/user-management-app && npm run build && cd ../data-grid-app && npm run build && cd ../analytics-app && npm run build && cd ../settings-app && npm run build && cd ../container && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd frontend/container && npm test && cd ../user-management-app && npm test && cd ../data-grid-app && npm test && cd ../analytics-app && npm test && cd ../settings-app && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend/container && npm run lint && cd ../user-management-app && npm run lint && cd ../data-grid-app && npm run lint && cd ../analytics-app && npm run lint && cd ../settings-app && npm run lint

author: Micro-Frontend Team
